projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: A functional chatbot interface using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The chatbot interacts with user, ask questions, display messages, and respond with precision.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A responsive weather app built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It fetches real-time weather data via an API and displays the city name, temperature, weather conditions, sunrise/sunset times, and a 4-day forecast in a user-friendly interface.
